data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample VISHERLS-162

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Lehmiger Sand, Humuseis. , Tree line 680 m, av. Tree height 29 m, Tree cover 70%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 70%, Moss cover 40%, Vegatation type: Pinetum vaccinoso - myrtillosum, Film number: 988A
